channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: ZK proofs could change the internet, not just Web3 — Aleo exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: ZK proofs could help online privacy by only revealing relevant user information, solving the internet's “biggest problem,” says Brennen Schlueter.

item.title: Tesla’s diamond hands: EV maker's Bitcoin holdings see no change in Q2
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: After purchasing $1.5 billion worth of Bitcoin in 2021, Tesla sold 75% of it in 2022 and is now hanging onto its remaining $184 million Bitcoin stash.

item.title: South Korean central bank charts out future course of payment systems, CBDC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The BOK 2022 Payment and Settlement Systems Report is a forward-looking document with ambitious plans for financial technology in the country.

item.title: 3 reasons why Bitcoin traders anticipate BTC price to briefly sweep the $27.5K level
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Nibley
item.description: Overhead resistance levels continue to constrict Bitcoin price expansion, leading some analysts to forecast a brief sweep of the $27,500 level.

item.title: No impact from Ripple ruling? SEC chair cites risks from crypto in budget request
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Gary Gensler cited the “Wild West of the crypto markets” that was “rife with noncompliance” in requesting more than $2.4 billion for the commission’s 2024 fiscal budget.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Bitcoin’s bullish hype fades, but analyst says PlanB’s stock-to-flow model is still relevant
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: A popular Bitcoin price model returns to center stage as BTC’s next halving approaches.

item.title: Scientists warn the ‘quantum revolution’ may stagnate economic growth
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: There are “traps” lying in wait for innovators at the vanguard of fintech and quantum computing, according to researchers.

item.title: Price analysis 7/19: BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, ADA, SOL, DOGE, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin’s failure to rebound off strong support levels increases the risk of a deeper correction that could also negatively impact altcoins.

item.title: Multiple spot crypto ETF applications go to Federal Register in step toward SEC approval
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Publishing the ETF applications in the official journal of the U.S. government gives the SEC up to 240 days — until March 2024 — for final approval or denial.

item.title: Google Play Store officially allows NFT games, but no gambling: Nifty Newsletter, July 12–18
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: An on-chain tile-sliding game has been causing a massive spike in daily transactions on the Sui Network.

item.title: Apple has its own GPT AI system but no stated plans for public release: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The Cupertino, California-based company reportedly developed an internal GPT system on Google infrastructure for employees to tinker with.

item.title: Bipartisan bill to regulate DeFi, crypto security risks introduced into US Senate
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The bill was introduced in the evening and has not been published yet, but it is already causing a stir. Crypto Twitter calls it a “nonstarter.”

item.title: US lawmakers propose SEC chair consider legislation, not enforcement approach to crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Reps. French Hill and Dusty Johnson suggested the SEC may have undertaken certain actions on crypto “seemingly timed to coincide with related Congressional activity."

item.title: Proof-of-truth: Countering AI overreach through Cointelegraph’s Historical NFTs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Historical
item.category: Explore how Cointelegraph’s Historical Collection is using NFTs to combat AI’s looming threat to information integrity.
item.description: Investing in authenticity: Here’s how Cointelegraph’s Historical Collection combats AI’s impact on information.

item.title: Bitcoin mining is becoming more environmentally friendly
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Didar Bekbauov
item.description: Bitcoin mining is becoming more sustainable thanks to things like hydro-cooling farms and associated petroleum gas — undermining environmental criticism.

item.title: Crypto VCs share lessons on startup success at EthCC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “A multitude of expansion factors curated at the [VC] group level” helps startups get traction, says Tony Cheng of Foresight Ventures.

item.title: SEC vs. Ripple: Huge win for crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of The Market Report, Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses Ripple’s latest win against the SEC and what it means for the crypto market.

item.title: Tokenizing music royalties as NFTs could help the next Taylor Swift
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jonathan DeYoung
item.description: Negative experiences in the music biz have seen artists like 3lau, Nas and The Weeknd turn to tokenized royalties for a fair deal.

item.title: AI opens doors for NFT artist Ellie Pritts at Bitforms gallery in NYC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vittoria Benzine
item.description: Artificial intelligence and analog technology collaborate across the imaginative animations of noted Los Angeles-based NFT artist Ellie Pritts.

item.title: Nasdaq halts launch of cryptocurrency custody service
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Nasdaq said it remains committed to digital asset business development and will be monitoring market events in the near future.

item.title: AI optimizing crypto exchange functions — Bitget exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Artificial intelligence tools are providing solutions to various functions and departments within major cryptocurrency exchanges.

item.title: Russian CBDC by 2025? What’s happening with the digital ruble
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: 2025–2027 might still seem far away, but the Central Bank of Russia is preparing its CBDC for mass adoption by then.

item.title: CoinMarketCap’s H1 2023 report says Q2 was a ‘lost quarter’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Sectors like virtual and augmented reality soared 704% in year-to-date growth, while artificial intelligence and big data expanded 323%.

item.title: Manta Network developer raises $25M in Series A, launches layer 2 for ZK apps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amaka Nwaokocha
item.description: The funds will be utilized to expand the network, attract more users and explore diverse use cases for Manta Pacific.

item.title: What is extended reality (XR), explained
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: Extended reality refers to the combination of virtual reality, augmented reality and mixed reality technologies.

item.title: 5 free data set sources to use for data science projects
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Discover five reliable sources where you can access diverse and high-quality data sets for free, fueling your next data-driven project.

item.title: Société Générale subsidiary becomes the first fully-licensed crypto provider in France
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Forge will have a right to custody digital assets, to purchase and sell them for legal tender, and to trade them against each other.

item.title: Hong Kong would not go crypto without China’s approval — Animoca exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: China looks at Web3 as a powerful tool to challenge the United States’ technological and economic hegemony, the Animoca co-founder said.

item.title: Celsius could repay all claims if Bitcoin, Ether prices rose 2X — Simon Dixon
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Dixon said creditors should fight to get out of the bankruptcy proceedings before the end of 2023, or before the price of BTC and ETH hit the estimated mark.
